text:
René Pétillon (; 12 December 1945 – 30 September 2018) was a French satirical and political cartoonist and comics artist. He was most famous for his work in "Canard Enchaîné". As a comics artist his best known and longest-running series was the humoristic comic strip "Jack Palmer", about a goofy private detective.
Pétillon died from a long-illness on 30 September 2018 at the age of 72.
